professional_summary.content: Experienced Mobile App Project Manager with a strong background in managing end-to-end delivery of digital products. Expertise in orchestrating mobile payments applications, API development, and ensuring compliance with industry standards. Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams and engage stakeholders for successful project outcomes.
professional_summary.evidence_source: Based on work experience and skills from profile

work_experience.title: Mobile App Project Manager
responsibilities: Led the end-to-end delivery of a new payments mobile app, managing both offshore and onshore development teams.
Orchestrated comprehensive mobile payments application delivery ensuring pilot delivery and roll-out planning.
Directed technical feasibility assessments and implementation strategies for digital wallet solutions.
Coordinated integration of over 20 suppliers including fraud detection and open banking.
Developed and implemented internal integration standards and APIs supporting governance and reporting.

skills.evidence_source: Skills section and work descriptions from profile

updateRequest: Add a section for certifications and include any certifications from the profile.
